description: Craft 1 furnace using 8 cobblestone on a crafting table as the platform.
tips:
1 furnace can be crafted with 8 cobblestone as the material and crafting table as the platform.
cobblestone is obtained by mining stone. stone is most found in level 55. cobblestone can only be mined with a wooden pickaxe or better; using bare hands will yield nothing.
1 wooden pickaxe can be crafted with 3 planks and 2 stick as the material and crafting table as the platform.
1 crafting table can be crafted with 4 planks and do not need any tool and any platform.
4 stick can be crafted with 2 planks and do not need any tool and any platform. the number of stick can only be crafted in multiples of 4
12 planks can be crafted with 3 log and do not need any tool and any platform. the number of planks can only be crafted in multiples of 4
log is obtained by mining wood. log can only be mined with bare hands.
